module.uhc.half_health.description: Cuts the health of players by half
module.uhc.loots.better_food.description: Many mobs and animals drop cooked food in larger quantities
module.uhc.loots.blasted_ores.descriptio: All ores get smelt, doubled and bring more experience. Coal gives torches.
module.uhc.tree_chopper.description: Trees get cut instantly and drop oak planks
module.uhc.very_fast.description: Stronger permanent haste and speed effects
text.uhc.bar.invulnerable: You will be vulnerable to damages in %s...
text.uhc.bar.shrinking: The world is shrinking! Finished in %s...
text.uhc.bar.wild: The world will start shrinking in %s...
text.uhc.cages_end: Players have been dropped on the map. Good luck!
text.uhc.invulnerability_end: You are no longer immune to damages!
text.uhc.wild_end: The world has started shrinking! Go to the center of the map!
